Documentation

A brief guide to get started with Boost.

  • Go top ↑

Getting Started

Unzip the theme package to any folder and open a command line at that location.

Boost's dev tools require Node and Gulp CLI. To install Node go to Node.js and follow the instructions. To install Gulp CLI run the following command:

npm i gulp-cli -g

Then run the following npm command to install all the theme's dependencies:

npm i

Boost uses Browsersync to serve pages from the dist directory. Running gulp will compile the theme, copy all required files to the dist directory and will open a browser window to dist/index.html.

gulp

Other gulp tasks available:

  • gulp css: Compiles and minifies scss files to dist.
  • gulp watch: Starts a local server and watch for changes.

Files structure

Within the theme you’ll find the following directories and files:

                        
                            ├── dist/
                            │   ├── css/
                            │   │   ├── fontawesome-all.min.css
                            │   │   ├── theme.min.css
                            │   ├── img/
                            │   ├── js/
                            │   │   ├── bootstrap.min.js
                            │   │   ├── jquery.slim.min.js
                            │   │   ├── popper.min.js
                            │   ├── webfonts/
                            │   ├── index.html
                            │   ├── ..
                            │   src/
                            │   ├── html/
                            │   │   ├── pages/
                            │   │   ├── templates/
                            │   ├── img/
                            │   ├── scss/
                            │   │   ├── custom/
                            │   │   ├── theme.scss
                            ├── gulpfile.js
                            ├── package.json
                            ├── README.md

Basic template

The basic template is a guideline for how to structure your pages when building with this theme.

                        
                            <!doctype html>
                            <html lang="en">
                            <head>
                            <meta charset="utf-8">
                            <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">

                            <!-- Google Fonts -->
                            <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Merriweather:400,700%7CMerriweather+Sans:300,400,700" rel="stylesheet">

                            <!-- Font Awesome -->
                            <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/fontawesome-all.min.css">

                            <!-- CSS (including Bootstrap) -->
                            <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/theme.min.css">

                            <title>Bootstrap Theme</title>
                            </head>
                            <body>
                            <h1>Hello, world!</h1>

                            <!-- Bootstrap JS -->
                            <script src="js/jquery.slim.min.js"></script>
                            <script src="js/popper.min.js"></script>
                            <script src="js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
                            </body>

Accessibility

Boost theme is built with accessibility in mind and includes the following best practices:

  • Valid and semantic code
  • 'Skip to main content' link
  • Underlined links within paragraphs
  • High color contrast between text and background
  • ARIA attributes

Changelog

1.3.0 - 04 April 2019

Added
  • Pages
    • App
    • Course
    • Saas
    • Log in
    • Sign up
    • Forgot password
    • Pricing cards
    • Pricing table
    • Style
  • Styles
    • Border to separate links on mobile navigation
    • Font family class (serif/sans-serif): _text.scss
    • Class for minimum height size: .min-vh-{10-90}
    • Spacing value: 7 ($spacer * 8)
    • Style for centered blockquote: _type.scss
    • .stretched-link to links in the blog page cards
    • Transition effect to linked thumbnails
  • Attributes
    • aria-hidden attribute to accordion icons
Updated
  • Bootstrap to 4.3.1
  • Font Awesome to 5.8.1
  • Gulp to 4.0.0

1.2.0 - 04 February 2019

Added
  • role="presentation" to decorative <hr>'s
Updated
  • Bootstrap to 4.2.1
  • Popper.js to 1.14.7
  • Font Awesome to 5.7.0
Changed
  • Navbar:
    • moved .container outside of <nav>
    • padding: _variables.scss
Removed
  • Unused background property: _alerts.scss

1.1.0 - 24 October 2018

Added
  • Pages: blog and article
  • Pagination styles: _pagination.scss
  • Table styles: _tables.scss
Updated
  • Font Awesome to 5.4.1
Changed
  • Accordion:
    • header link nested inside heading element
    • role="button" attribute added
  • Transition properties: _cards.scss, _links.scss

1.0.0 - Initial release
